short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Schedule Builder experience for UCalgary students

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
UCalgary Schedule Helper is a must-have app for all UCalgary students. It is designed to enhance the Schedule Builder experience and save students time and effort by streamlining the process of finding course details, professor ratings, and building locations.

This app converts course number text on the Schedule Builder into a link to the outline page, providing students with quick access to course details such as prerequisites, course descriptions, and learning objectives. Additionally, the app converts professor names into a link to Rate My Prof, a popular website that provides ratings and reviews of professors to help students make informed decisions when selecting courses.

Moreover, UCalgary Schedule Helper also automatically converts building and room number text into a Google Maps link, making it easy for students to locate their classes and get directions to their classrooms.

With UCalgary Schedule Helper, students no longer have to waste time searching for course information, professor ratings, or building locations. This app simplifies the entire process and provides students with all the information they need to succeed in their studies. So why wait? Download UCalgary Schedule Helper today and streamline your schedule-building experience!

Note: Please note that all software and images used on this extension belong to their respective owners and are protected by copyright laws. This extension is not affiliated with the University of Calgary, and is solely intended for non-commercial, personal use. Any trademarks or logos used on extension are the property of their respective owners and are used for identification purposes only.
